item.anomaly_delight.spring_breath_qingt: It is the warmth and sweetness that I have long lost but am trying to seek.
item.anomaly_delight.starry_sky_white_fl: You promised me, so muster up your courage and go make friends with her.
item.anomaly_delight.long_awaited_centur: In the midsummer sunlight, you and I who have crossed timeâ€”are we still the same as we once were?
item.anomaly_delight.radish_cane_sea_bre: On the last day of life, we swam through the rest of our days in a sea of data.
item.anomaly_delight.homestyle_canned_ch: If I could talk to them again, I would give anything.
item.anomaly_delight.golden_cupcakes_wit: Forgetting those you love, falling in love with someone who doesn't love you, and realizing it all in the end.
item.anomaly_delight.shanghai_sunrise_co: The dawn of humanity will still rise as usual; civilization will be rebuilt upon the ruins.
